Information From the Restaurant Offers
Description: House of Wong is a Asian , Chinese , and Fast Food restaurant where most Menuism users came for fun with friends , paid between $10 and $25 , and tipped between 15% to 18% . Tags: Asian, Chinese, Fast Food, Good For Kids, Takeout, and Good for groups

Reviews for House of Wong Write a review 4 reviews First reviewed by Laureate651
0 helpful votes over 1 review ruthanne 1 Restaurant Review 0
Add as friend Send Msg House of Wong ruthanne September 21, 2011 5.0 5.0 star rating 0 0 0 0 Votes great food
I grew up eating at House of Wong and taking out food…………..never had a bad outing. Took my best friend there last May and she fell in love with the food……………their food is great…………..service was friendly and fast. Will always go there…………..not like some restaurants where all the food is the same color………….. The quantities are huge……………….so its always like eating there for two days………….. judging by the amt of people that eat there…………they must be doing something right. Link To Review

3 helpful votes over 9 reviews Laureate651 9 Restaurant Reviews +3
Add as friend Send Msg House of Wong Laureate651 December 29, 2009 2.0 2.0 star rating 0 0 0 0 Votes Poor service, average food
I used to get House of Wong to go fairly often when I worked in the Roseville area. The food is average in terms of quality. The pot stickers are tasty but everything else seems bland. It is also a lot more expensive than many other places. You can find better food and cheaper prices up the street at Chin’s Kitchen. I have also had a couple very poor experiences with the customer service. On my last visit about 4 months ago they mixed up my order. When I told them that I had not gotten the sesame chicken I ordered they insisted I didn’t order it and would not help me in any way. They dismissed me and refused to acknowledge me. I have not been back since. Link To Review

August 6, 2010
4 star rating
House of Wong
I only been here once and had their chick fried rice and egg rolls. The food was okay, but then again I didn't try anything fancy. The service was fast and super friendly. The restaurant though could use some renovations.
read full review» Karin L from Insider Pages
March 30, 2010
3 star rating
Good Food Here
When I lived in St. Paul my family would go here quite often. Food is good and reasonably priced. Surprisingly one of my family's favorite things on the menu is the cheeseburger basket - it's really good.
